name: Ext_R5_ClinicalImpression_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ClinicalImpression.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalImpression.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalImpression|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: Identifies the workflow status of the assessment.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.status` maps to R4 `ClinicalImpression.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labelled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: Identifies the workflow status of the assessment.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.status` maps to R4 `ClinicalImpression.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The workflow state of a clinical impression.
